metadata.title: CVE-2017-18245 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The mpc8_probe function in libavformat/mpc8.c in Libav 12.2 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via acrafted audio file.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
